projects.title: Purple Rain
projects.description: I made this for my wife when she was out of town. It says 'i miss you' over some purple rain.

projects.title: Backtracking Sudoku Solver
projects.description: This using recursive backracking to solve any Sudoku board. It is slightly modified in order to draw progress every frame.

projects.title: Maze Generator
projects.description: Creates a maze from a grid of cells using stack data structures and random choice.
